comment: * A utility class for creating and animating the Smart Select animation.

methods.name: public void startAnimation(final PointF start, final List<RectangleWithTextSelectionLayout> destinationRectangles, final Runnable onAnimationEnd)
public boolean isAnimationActive()
methods.comment: Returns whether the sprite is currently animating.

methods.name: private Animator createAnimator(final RectangleList rectangleList, final float startingOffsetLeft, final float startingOffsetRight, final ValueAnimator.AnimatorUpdateListener updateListener, final Runnable onAnimationEnd)
private void setUpAnimatorListener(final Animator animator, final Runnable onAnimationEnd)
private static int[] generateDirections(final RectangleWithTextSelectionLayout centerRectangle, final List<RectangleWithTextSelectionLayout> rectangles)
private static boolean contains(final RectF rectangle, final PointF point)
methods.comment:
* A variant of {@link RectF#contains(float, float)} that also allows the point to reside on
     * the right boundary of the rectangle.
     *
     * @param rectangle the rectangle inside which the point should be to be considered "contained"
     * @param point     the point which will be tested
     * @return whether the point is inside the rectangle (or on it's right boundary)

methods.name: public void cancelAnimation()
methods.comment: * Cancels any active Smart Select animation that might be in progress.
